item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“iceman327, post:6, topic:165644”][quote author=Coldbloodio link=topic=224703.msg1937676#msg1937676 date=1197963332]
Your arrays are not correct. This is done by you not setting them right. Go to a silab tutorial and do it over again.

Since you didnt post enough info I can’t tell you if this is right or not, But alot of people have this error.
[/quote]
allright well heres my array thing

public static boolean[] itemStackable = new boolean[20000];
public static boolean[] itemIsNote = new boolean[20000];
public static boolean[] itemTwoHanded = new boolean[20000];
public static boolean[] itemTradeable = new boolean[20000];
public static boolean[] itemSellable = new boolean[20000];
static {

help please[/quote]

You read tobia’s tutorial right?
